product_name: Salomon S-Lab XT 6 Softground Trail-Running Shoes - Men's
long_description: Looking to race on wet and sloppy trails with confidence? The Salomon S-Lab XT 6 Softground Trail-Running Shoes combine a precise fit with remarkable comfort so you can perform your best on race day. Water-repellent uppers help keep your feet dry when you're stomping through puddles on wet trails. Uppers feature Endofit(TM) internal sleeves that are designed to hug the feet in exactly the right places for a great fit. Thermoplastic urethane overlays secure insteps and lock heels down; toe caps provide protection. Quicklace(TM) lacing system with friction-free eyelets takes just a single pull for a perfect fit. Tongues are designed to keep mud and debris from getting into the shoes. Washable OrthoLite(R) foam insoles enhance comfort. Nonmarking Contagrip(R) rubber outsoles on the Salomon S-Lab XT 6 Softground Trail-Running Shoes deliver traction across mixed terrain and sloppy trail conditions.
short_description: Looking to race on wet and sloppy trails with confidence? The Salomon S-Lab XT 6 Softground Trail-Running Shoes combine a precise fit with remarkable comfort so you can perform your best on race day.
